about_the_game:
Have you ever noticed how tomato plant leaves look a bit like cannabis leaves?

I have. After losing my job and being strapped for cash, the thought crossed my mind more than once.

So, here we are: starting as a broke store clerk, struggling to make ends meet, dabbling in a few side hustles like growing plants, turning those plants into produce. Maybe someday, we’ll venture into some illicit produce — if we figure out how to pull it off? Hydroponics, farmland, or hiding plants in the back garden?

Where do you sell? How you sell? Is it dangerous? All great questions, but I can’t give you those answers. Maybe you'll figure them out before I do?

Here’s what I do know: Buy low, Sell high. Balance resources, automate strategically and expand your little side hustle into something more. Do better than I did—good luck out there!

How It Plays:

It’s a cosy clicker game, so you can actively engage to progress quickly, or let it run in the background. As your hustle builds, you might be able to make enough to survive, maybe even turn it into your full-time career. Whether you’re tracking every trade fluctuation or chilling with a cosy play style, the choice is yours.

Now go grow your empire into something amazing, maybe we will meet, or even compete?

Have you ever noticed how tomato plant leaves look a bit like cannabis leaves?

I have. After losing my job and being strapped for cash, the thought crossed my mind more than once.

So, here we are: starting as a broke store clerk, struggling to make ends meet, dabbling in a few side hustles like growing plants, turning those plants into produce. Maybe someday, we’ll venture into some illicit produce — if we figure out how to pull it off? Hydroponics, farmland, or hiding plants in the back garden?

Where do you sell? How you sell? Is it dangerous? All great questions, but I can’t give you those answers. Maybe you'll figure them out before I do?

Here’s what I do know: Buy low, Sell high. Balance resources, automate strategically and expand your little side hustle into something more. Do better than I did—good luck out there!

It’s a cosy clicker game, so you can actively engage to progress quickly, or let it run in the background. As your hustle builds, you might be able to make enough to survive, maybe even turn it into your full-time career. Whether you’re tracking every trade fluctuation or chilling with a cosy play style, the choice is yours.

Now go grow your empire into something amazing, maybe we will meet, or even compete?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE3 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Stereo Sound or Better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Sound Card: Not required
mac_requirements.recommended:

name: Up n Smoke

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE3 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Sound Card: Not required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Sound Card: Integrated Stereo Sound or Better

short_description: Drug empire or Salad chef, either way, you need a green thumb in this cosy plant growing game. Start as a broke store clerk. Click your side hustle to a full blown empire of illicit growing and trading. Resource management and selling high will be key to your success.
